sectionDescription: Honoring the visionaries who helped build our infrastructure and support needy students

donors.name: Nauman Iftikhar
donors.message: Investing in energy is investing in the future of education.

donors.name: Muhammad Ajmal
donors.message: Proud to serve the school that served our community for decades.

donors.message: Books are the quietest and most constant of friends.
